name: Unstable Bridge Building
description:
Unstable Bridge Building

For Ludum Dare 49

‘Unstable’

In a deep dark cave, you need to get to the other side, You have a few bridges on hand, so why not build a bridge?

It’s a totally normal bridge builder game… except no supports this time around, so try not to shake up your bridges too much or else it’ll collapse.

Collect coins on the way if you can, but make sure to avoid all the spiders and bats flying everywhere!

Controls

A, D, or arrow keys to move left and right

Space to Jump

Hold left click and drag to place bridges
